summary: THE VEHICLE HAD AN AUTOMATIC TRANSMISSION LOCK OUT FAILURE.  THE CONSUMER WAS ABLE TO CHANGE GEARS WITHOUT FIRST PUSHING ON THE BRAKE PEDAL TO SHIFT OUT OF PARK POSITION.  LOCK OUT FEATURE WORKED INTERMITTENTLY.  DEALER REPLACED INTERLOCK CABLE AND IGNITION SWITCH.   DEALER WORKED ON 4 TIMES.  HOWEVER THE INTERLOCK STILL DID NOT ENGAGE PROPERLY.    *TT  *JB
